I work out vigorously to keep in shape and avoid eating vegetables that I dislike, which my parents are unaware of.

content.text: Hello! I'm looking for someone to talk to and learn more about people from other cultures.
Hello there! I'm glad to chat with you. What do you want to know?
What is your favorite type of food?
My favorite type of food is mushroom ravioli.
That sounds delicious! I've never had it before. Do you cook it yourself?
I love to cook, but I usually order it from a restaurant.
That's awesome! I don't cook much, but I love to bake.
Baking is fun! What do you like to bake?
I like to make cakes and cookies. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun to try new things.
I'm sure you're better than you think! I love trying new recipes too.
What are some of your favorite recipes?
I love making chocolate chip cookies and banana bread.
Those sound delicious! I'll have to try them sometime.
You should! They're both very easy to make.
Thanks for the recommendations! It was nice chatting with you.
You too! I hope we can talk again soon.
